html: . @IVFoundation is 24 years old. Happy birthday. Thank all who were & continue to b an integral part of this intensively joyful journey. It began with receipt of #Magsaysay Award today in 1994. Foundation now is a valueable resource in prison reforms & a destination for many.pic.twitter.com/CJDHo7QHJ0
text:
. @IVFoundation is 24 years old. Happy birthday. 
Thank all who were & continue to b an integral part of this intensively joyful journey. It began with receipt of  #Magsaysay Award today in 1994. 
Foundation now is a valueable resource in prison reforms & a destination for many.pic.twitter.com/CJDHo7QHJ0

html: Many edu institutions have land to sensitise students & engage them with Flora and fauna of the surroundings. Why not do so? All have environment clubs too. Why not practice what we preach? html: A surprise visit to Police Control In Puducherry. It records all complaints as they come.They transmit it to sister depts as per need. They follow up and inform complainant and check satisfaction. A very satisfying visit. All staff is being given a recorded appreciation @ANIpic.twitter.com/10ZI8Zc6sa
text:
A surprise visit to Police Control In Puducherry. It records all complaints as they come.They transmit it to sister depts as per need. 
They follow up and inform complainant and check satisfaction. 
A very satisfying visit. 
All staff is being given a recorded appreciation @ANIpic.twitter.com/10ZI8Zc6sa

html: From Mahe. Town of just 40,000. It is open defecation free & residents make organic manure out of home waste. Most literate. 90% pay their property taxes. Women outnumber. Can be a Model Town வெள்ளத்தால் பாதிக்கப்பட்ட மாஹேவில் கிரண்பேடி சைக்கிள் பயணம்!https://www.nakkheeran.in/24-by-7-news/india/kiranbedi-cycling-mahe …
text:

html: School children met with at Mahe. They were bright & curious. They asked very useful Qs. Interestingly as a policy, senior school students are given bicycles. But not seen to be using them. They were inspired to use it and be part of cause-related-rallies. They shall hereafter.pic.twitter.com/U6tUt6bNKB
text:
School children met with at Mahe. They were bright & curious. 
They asked very useful Qs. 
Interestingly as a policy, senior school students are given bicycles. But not seen to be using them.
They were inspired to use it and be part of cause-related-rallies.
They shall hereafter.pic.twitter.com/U6tUt6bNKB

html: A rewarding visit to Mahe. Beginning with review of progress of the Walk Way. Morning:Mahe-Connect Cycle Rally, Adm review, interaction with school children & Open House. text:

text:
